wikipedia_page.main: Allan Collins (24 January 1918 – 10 April 2002) was a Scottish footballer who played for Kilmarnock,  Raith Rovers and Stenhousemuir in the Scottish Football League either side of the Second World War. Collins was part of the Kilmarnock side in the 1938 Scottish Cup Final, which they lost to East Fife after a replay.

response: * Allan Collins (Scottish footballer) (1918–2002), Kilmarnock FC player
* Max Allan Collins (born 1948), American mystery writer
